channel.title: Need to fkash image for wp76xx from Raspberry PI
channel.description:
please offer a sierra tool, in which I can use to flash image from RPI to wp76xx
I know I can download image to the wp76xx and use fwupdate
that is not what I need
I need to be able to flash directlly, similar to what I do from PC using swiflash tool

item.title: Need to fkash image for wp76xx from Raspberry PI
item.dc:creator: jyijyi
item.description:
you can try the MBPL_SDK_R28_ENG5-fwdwl.bin.tar.gz

https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/mbpl/mbpl-software-latest/#sthash.pz0YFVcT.dpbs

e.g.
sudo ./bin/fwdwl-litehostx86_64 -m 4 -d /dev/ttyUSB0 -p /dev/cdc-wdm0 -t 1 -f /home/owner/Desktop/WP76_FW/

Read full topic
item.source: Need to fkash image for wp76xx from Raspberry PI
